widgets.title: Velocloud Credential Management
widgets.extra_filter: type in ['velocloud-orchestrator'] and (customerTag is '{{CUST_TAG}}' or customerTag is empty)

widgets.title: Discovery
widgets.extra_filter: vco_cred is not empty and (customer_tag is '{{CUST_TAG}}' or customer_tag is empty)

formFieldList.help: CSV file format.The file should contain vco_cred,  enterprise_id columns.
formFieldList.label: NOTE: Required headers in CSV file: vco_cred,  enterprise_id
Discovery Scope
formFieldList.help: Should this be part of device?
Readonly field. Name of Credentials to be deleted.
formFieldList.label: Credentials

formFieldList.help: Readonly field. Name of Enterprise ID to be deleted.
formFieldList.label: Enterprise ID

formFieldList.help: Readonly field. Discovery Scope to be deleted.
formFieldList.label: Discovery Scope

widget.title: Velocloud Credential Management
widget.extra_filter: type in ['velocloud-orchestrator'] and (customerTag is '{{CUST_TAG}}' or customerTag is empty)

formFieldList.help: If you select Run then the pipeline will run to perform the credentials check for different velocloud devices.
formFieldList.label: Do you want to run access verification for different velocloud devices?

formFieldList.help: custom field to set run mode
formFieldList.label: Custom Run Mode

widget.title: Velocloud Credential Management
widget.extra_filter: type in ['velocloud-orchestrator'] and (customerTag is '{{CUST_TAG}}' or customerTag is empty)

formFieldList.help: If you select Run then the pipeline will run to perform the credentials check for different velocloud-orchestrator.
formFieldList.label: Do you want to run velocloud Inventory Pipeline?

formFieldList.help: custom field to set run mode
formFieldList.label: Custom Run Mode

widgets.title: All Jobs
widgets.extra_filter: pipeline_name in ['vco','vco_inv_collection_main','vco_access_verification'] and (customerTag is '{{CUST_TAG}}' or customerTag is empty)

custom_columns.label: Run Mode
custom_columns.expr0: 'manual' if attributes_deployment_run_mode is None else attributes_deployment_run_mode
